nbastatR 0.1.1106

NBA All Star Games

Source: R/bref.R

Returns scores from All-Star Games

get_all_star_game_scores(include_aba = T, return_message = T)

Arguments

include_aba

if `TRUE` includes ABA scores
return_message

if `TRUE` returns a message

Value

a `data_frame`

Examples

# NOT RUN {
library(dplyr)
library(nbastatR)
df_asg <-
get_all_star_game_scores()
df_asg %>% glimpse()
df_asg %>% count(namePlayerMVP, sort = T)
# }
